test module¶

test_cases¶

profitroll.test.test_cases.bubble_test(path, Lx, Ly, Nx, Ny, dt, nb_state, cx, cy, radius)¶

Bubble test case (circular intrusion)

Parameters

  • path (str) – path where the NetCDF file will be created

  • Lx (float) – Horizontal length of the grid

  • Ly (float) – Vertical length of the grid

  • Nx (int) – Horizontal number of cells of the grid

  • Ny (int) – Vertical number of cells of the grid

  • dt (float) – Time step

  • nb_state (int) – Number of created steps (same)

  • cx (int) – Horizontal position of the center of the intrusion

  • cy (int) – Vertical position of the center of the intrusion

  • radius (float) – Radius of the circular intrusion

Returns

The created dataset

Return type

Dataset at NETCDF4 format

profitroll.test.test_cases.create_initial_netcdf(path, Lx, Ly, Nx, Ny, dt, nb_state)¶

Creates an initial NetCDF for test cases of tropopause intrusion evolution.

Parameters

  • path (str) – path where the NetCDF file will be created

  • Lx (float) – Horizontal length of the grid

  • Ly (float) – Vertical length of the grid

  • Nx (int) – Horizontal number of cells of the grid

  • Ny (int) – Vertical number of cells of the grid

Returns

The created dataset

Return type

Dataset at NETCDF4 format

profitroll.test.test_cases.gaussian_test(path, Lx, Ly, Nx, Ny, dt, nb_state)¶

Gaussian (intrusion) test case of fixed variance Px=8 (horizontal) and Py=64 (vertical)

Parameters

  • path (str) – path where the NetCDF file will be created

  • Lx (float) – Horizontal length of the grid

  • Ly (float) – Vertical length of the grid

  • Nx (int) – Horizontal number of cells of the grid

  • Ny (int) – Vertical number of cells of the grid

  • dt (float) – Time step

  • nb_state (int) – Number of created steps (same)

Returns

The created dataset

Return type

Dataset at NETCDF4 format

profitroll.test.test_cases.v_stripe_test(path, Lx, Ly, Nx, Ny, dt, nb_state, dX, dY, depth=15)¶

V stripe (intrusion) test case

Parameters

  • path (str) – path where the NetCDF file will be created

  • Lx (float) – Horizontal length of the grid

  • Ly (float) – Vertical length of the grid

  • Nx (int) – Horizontal number of cells of the grid

  • Ny (int) – Vertical number of cells of the grid

  • dt (float) – Time step

  • nb_state (int) – Number of created steps (same)

  • dX (int) – Nx - 2dX corresponds to the horizontal width of the v stripe

  • dY (int) – 2dY corresponds to the vertical width of the v stripe

  • depth (float, optional) – Depth of the v stripe, default to 15

Returns

The created dataset

Return type

Dataset at NETCDF4 format
